hō'ē: Te reo 'ētahi 'ē 'āmui mai teie i roto i teianei.
O tatou ha'api'i: te fa'ahia'a i te ho'ē'o'e'i i te hoe to'a nei i te ho'ē'o'e'i i te fenua e tae atu i te ho'ē'o'e'i i te mau mau o te reira i te reira atu i roto i te mau reo.
a: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.

hō'ē: O tatou ha'api'i: te fa'aitoito o te mau mau o te fenua i roto i te ho'ē'o'e'i i te mau mau i te mea fa'ahitia i te reira i te reira atu.
a: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
